title: Could a Market Blowout Like the UKâ€™s Happen in the US?
description: Federal Reserve and White House officials spent last week quizzing investors and economists about the risks of a British-style meltdown at home.
dc:creator: Jeanna Smialek, Jim Tankersley and Joe Rennison
media:credit: John Taggart for The New York Times
media:description: Investors and market economists are increasingly concerned that, given how much policy has shifted around the world, something could easily go wrong.
